titleStmt.title: The upright man and his happy end opened and applyed in a sermon preached at the funerals of the Honourable Francis Pierrepoint Esq., third son to the Right Honourable Robert, late Earl of Kingston, on the 18th of March 1657 in the parish church of Holm Pierepont in Nottinghamshire, the place of his interrement / by John Whitlock.
titleStmt.author: Whitlock, John, 1625-1709.
